website_summaries.verdict: Full of ingredients that contribute to a shiny, healthy coat.
pros: Suitable for dogs at any stage of their life
Actively clears up dry flaky skin, leaving behind a healthy coat
cons: Fish-based food also contains chicken fat, not ideal for chicken allergies

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this food because I was concerned by the recent FDA warnings about the new "limited" dog foods not providing the proper heart nutrition in that they rely heavily on lentils and white potatoes and do not provide taurine a supplement for a healthy heart. I decided upon this food for its ingredients. This food did not cost any more than the less efficient food I was feeding my dog. It took 1 week for my dog to make the transition and wow what a difference! Her stools are firm, no more problems with anal glands and she seems to have more pep! I hope I did the right thing for her.
customer_reviews.author: Beth D.

customer_reviews.title: VICTOR- Grain Free- The Best On The Market Today- NO FILLER
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the BEST DOG food on the market today- The cost is great and the dogs love it- This has NO FILLER- This company is the real deal- If your dog suffers from Allergies- This dog food will help. Highly Recommend. We have a dog rescue and feed 16 dog- LOVE, LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Chem-Girl

customer_reviews.title: Our dog goes crazy for this food!
customer_reviews.text: We recently switched to this food from a more mainstream brand because our dog is having skin irritation issues. He's been eating it for about a week, so maybe too soon to tell if it is helping his skin, but he goes nuts for this food. I think it might be the best thing he's ever tasted. He literally waits by the pantry hoping we're going to give him more. Yes, it's more pricey than most food, but I feel really good about the fact that I can read the majority of the ingredients and based on how crazy he goes for it! I would definitely recommend this if you love your dog :)
customer_reviews.author: cck573

customer_reviews.title: Picky Eaters?  Try this food!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 Great Danes and have had trouble finding a food that wasn’t a plant based food and contained a high enough amount of protein. This one did the trick. My dogs loved it. I have tried other foods but wasn’t happy with that fact that I was feeding mostly plant based diet. My special needs Dane is itching less and they never leave anything in their bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Thiel

customer_reviews.title: My pup didn't hesitate, he loves it!
customer_reviews.text: From the time the bag was delivered my pup went crazy for this. We've been using this for 2 weeks now no complaints. I will say I did read the reviews about the new formula, the bag I got is the old formula. Crossing my fingers that if I get the next bag and it's the new formula hope he loves it also. Update....My pup is allergic to salmon😒 he broke out after eating this. We are looking for other alternatives within the brand because he's also allergic to chicken, Turkey, I have a Pitbull btw. I still think this is a Great brand .
customer_reviews.author: Demetrice

customer_reviews.title: The changed the formula! Beware!
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers mentioned, they changed the formulas up. Now one of my dogs is being treated for bloody diarrhea and the other refused to eat altogether. So I'm tossing a bag and a half and switching brands. I'm very disappointed(and angry that my girl is miserable and I'm out vet bills. My picky huskies LOVED this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy S.

customer_reviews.title: New Formula
customer_reviews.text: I am so tired of dog food companies changing the formula to save money. The new formula has decreased the salmon. My dog had an upset stomach, so I went on line to see if the ingredients had changed. Yes they had. I have changed food in the past for the very same reason. Called company & they told me the new formula was better. I can read labels & I disagree.
customer_reviews.author: some beach

customer_reviews.title: Large Kibble
customer_reviews.text: The kibble was too big for my 5 toy dogs. They eat it but it is slow going particularly for my 2 squashed nosed Japanese Chins. They all seem to like it but I will not buy it again because of the kibble size. They had no problems switching over to the new food and I didn’t do it gradually either. Seems to be a good food but is not for small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Weezie

customer_reviews.title: An American-made dog food at par in high quality with the main Canadian dog food brands.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the very high quality dog made in the U.S. (in Texas) and it is at par with Canadian dog food quality. I’m a big fan of Canadian brand “Acana” (considered by most as the best) made with salmon, but I can assure you that this Victor Yukon (with salmon) is at par in quality —my Rough Collie LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.author: jacinto8778

customer_reviews.title: Made my dogs sick
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if we got a bad batch or not but our dogs have both puked every day since we started transitioning them to this food. They've been eating Taste of The Wild Venison formula and I thought we could transition then to something different but I guess not. After 3 days of cleaning up puke, it's going in the trash. 😞
customer_reviews.author: curly sue

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. My dog is allergic to life. She's a bull terrier with BAD allergies. And this season has been the worst for her so far. She's almost 6 years old. She seems to eat this food better and doesn't sneeze afterward like she was doing on her old brand. I'm also giving her Aller-Immune Bites daily too, so I can't say that it's the food alone that is helping, but hopefully it is.
customer_reviews.author: N. E. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Westie Approved
customer_reviews.text: I read a load of information on this brand so I was assured of the quality the company recommended that I try this over the puppy because West Highland Terriers are known to have fussy stomach issues. I was on Hills SD Puppy and found it contained corn and corn meal and I know that dogs are not native maize eaters so I did some homework found the brand. No gas less fecal output smoother coat and happier puppy price was not that much more do I need to go on buying my second bag today as I do not have a retailer in Fargo and do not want to run out.
customer_reviews.author: C.J. Flanery

customer_reviews.title: Perfec!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has many allergies and this food is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Helen M. Freshcoln

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the right food!
customer_reviews.text: We purchase this food through a different vendor, but I cannot recommend this food enough. We have a 10 month old puppy and this is the only food we have tried that does not upset his stomach and he has been doing great since we switched him to this about 4 months ago. I wish Amazon had a more competitive price, or we would purchase through here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our Dachshunds enjoyed the Vistor Grain-Free Yukon River Salmon & Potato
customer_reviews.text: We like the higher nutritional values and grain free attribute of this Victor brand. Our dogs like the food and get it well and are thriving.
customer_reviews.author: E. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Recipe Change
customer_reviews.text: Beware they have "cheapened" their product. The second ingredient is now peas. Once great product is now cheap and crappy.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Southerland

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive stomach no more!
customer_reviews.text: The only dog food that works for well for my doberman with sensitive stomach. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: afterdarc

customer_reviews.title: Healthy food
customer_reviews.text: My two Bichons are picky eaters and they really like this. The kibble is smaller sized and easy for they to chew. The fish flavor is perfect and has no chicken
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Food
customer_reviews.text: We have a 2 year old Basset Hound that developed stomach and skin issues including having some bald spots. She had been on a grocery store Sensitive Stomach blend and it seemed to be making things worse. After switching to the Victor Salmon and Sweet Potato her stomach has cleared up and her skin and fur look very health. I would highly recommend, it is worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: I use this exclusively
customer_reviews.text: I can't really attest to the taste as I didn't eat it. My Belgian Tervs did and do. The scent? Ok, it's just dry dog food. This is some of the best available, and it is not made in China like a number of very well known brands.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Very good food.
customer_reviews.text: Very good food. I rotate brands and flavors, and prepare some homemade foods as well. I always include this kibble in the selection. Agree with other reviewers, it has a strong smell. Note also that this is a VERY small kibble size... About the size of a pea.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: very high quality, making it somewhat concentrated
customer_reviews.text: it smells good, my small dog loves it, and the ingredients look good. i hope the company that bought victor will not change it. the quality is high enough that it goes farther because its not extended with fillers.
customer_reviews.author: iquanyin

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs with skin issues!!
customer_reviews.text: My pitbull/ridgeback mix has very sensitive skin. Went from Iams chicken dry food to Victor beef and rice, that worked for a while, but then he had the worst breakout of hot spots, fungus, yeast of his life. After the vet treated him, we started on the Victor salmon. So far beautiful coat, better disposition. We will see...
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Crivelli

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My dog really loves this dog food it is the only dog food he has been consistent with, it smells strongly of fish when you open the bag.
customer_reviews.author: The Asgard Monk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this. No allergy break through and there is less poop to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Hates to wear socks

customer_reviews.title: The Dogs Love it and It Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: The two dogs in this picture are resting after a brisk, 3-mile walk. One dog is 14, the other is 10 and both are healthy, active dogs. They thrive on Victor Yukon River food - it gives them what the need to look and feel like much younger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy W.

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I like that my dog loves this flavor. For awhile there I had her on the orginal flavor and she eventually started to not want to eat it as much. Like she would leave it there until she was sure she had to eat it. I changed over to this one and she cant wait to eat now.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Food!!
customer_reviews.text: My Olde English Bulldogge has to have this or she has skin problems. This is way cheaper at my local feed store. Either way, cheaper than a vet bill!! Smells fishy! Go figure!! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Rosetta White

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves this - grain free and 100% fish ...
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this - grain free and 100% fish (many fish-based dog foods still contain chicken or other non-fish meats) which helps our dog with skin issues and her Cushing's disease....and way cheaper than going to a natural grocer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great American Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Made in Texas, and supplies the best nutrients and real meat. No grains, by-products, or chemicals. What's not to love?! My old Blue Heeler's coat shines like she's just been to the beauty parlor.
customer_reviews.author: Jacks Walzel

customer_reviews.title: Our fur baby’s favorite
customer_reviews.text: It has a strong salmon smell that keep my chocolate Labrador happy. Our fur baby has a sensitive stomach wand has had no problems since he started on this food. His coat is shining and he has great energy
customer_reviews.author: SCVeal

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog with food allergies. I have tried many different brands of foods this is the only brand that made a difference. His ear problems cleared up and he seems healthier. It costs more than the other brands but it’s cheaper than the vet visits.
customer_reviews.author: john york

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves Victor's dog food her coat is nice and shiny. Not to mention she is solid great source of protein. Easy on her stomach

customer_reviews.title: Grrrrreat
customer_reviews.text: My dog has allergies to chicken and grain and he stopped itching
customer_reviews.author: CATHY THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Dogs do not like it. I have to mix other foods/treats in with it just to get them to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Colton LeClaire

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Love It
customer_reviews.text: My dog is super sensitive to basically everything. We tried multiple foods and this keeps his coat and skin healthy. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Hershey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my German Shepherd breeder... Her coat is magnificent! Didn't realize how much a great quality food made a difference! My Yorkie gets it too
customer_reviews.author: Amy Graves

customer_reviews.title: Works for picky poodle with sensitive stomach
customer_reviews.text: Glad to be able to get this from Amazon during the pandemic stay-at-home.
customer_reviews.author: My2centsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Great balance of ingredients to keep dogs healthy, energetic, and weight controlled.
customer_reviews.author: MB3

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this. High quality. I have a German short haired pointer that’s allergic to a lot of other cheap dog foods. Perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but worth it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs favorite food in the whole world, tried first with a sample pack at a gormet shop.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Put a shine on my dog
customer_reviews.text: I have to feed more to my dog because this has lower calories than past dog food. Makes this a pricey product to feed to a calorie burning working dog. It did put a noticeably nicer shine on my dogs coat. Quality product but wish it was higher calories.
customer_reviews.author: KPICP

customer_reviews.title: Victor Dog food
customer_reviews.text: Victor dog food is great and my corgi has actually lost weight this past year which she needed to do--back issues. Victor is rated 5 star for quality of dog food on dog advisor
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: Our dog did well on this food and always liked it. We've rotated to a different one, but will likely come back to this at some point.
customer_reviews.author: DrC

customer_reviews.title: We love Victor!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food and we haven’t seen any allergies to it yet! For how much you get I believe it is at a great price! And love how Amazon has a automatic shopping option!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: finally a food that works for both of us....
customer_reviews.text: My dog always has trouble digesting dog food w/ lots of loose stools. Even when she is doing well her stools r very soft.... Until now! Now they are firmer & easier to pick up. No more tummy upsets, or horrible gas. She loves it! The pieces are small & she no longer chokes on her food, another plus. Love this food in every way!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great foid
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this stuff. It’s pricey but they actually eat a little less because it has high nutrition density. This means less poop in my yard!
customer_reviews.author: brad1972

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but my dogs will eat it so sacrifices are necessary lol
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this is really grain free
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a grain allergy. I tried this food as it was recommended to help put on weight and no reactions. However, my dog still experienced grin allergy reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this as he said his dogs coats shone with its use. The kibbles are small which our small dog likes. The salmon base energies her as well. She eats it heartily!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Read all the reviews and am happy I switched my Airedale to this product
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews and am happy I switched my Airedale to this product ... it agrees with his digestive system and he likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but the best for my fur baby!
customer_reviews.text: Only the best for my dog. It's grain free and has the nutrients a dog needs. She has a very sensitive stomach and it took a while before I found a formula that would agree with her digestive system. This is the only dog food I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Long

customer_reviews.title: Puppy says, "I love this Kibble"
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves it dry! His coat is beautiful and we like that it is no grain. We use it because the Breeder does and can't find anywhere in our city except one feed store out of town.
customer_reviews.author: Mirliegirlie

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality food. My dog loves it and it helps his very sensitive stomach.

customer_reviews.title: Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: grain free good dry dog food and easiest way to get for our dog

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food for my German Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price!! One of the only places I can purchase a smaller bags for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Puppy
customer_reviews.text: The best dog food. My puppy doberman is 4 mth. And 51 lbs. He is growing very healthy and very beautiful. He really enjoys this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mickel López

customer_reviews.title: Literally FULL of salmon!
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it. Greasy, but I assumed thats the fish oil.
customer_reviews.author: April Simmons

customer_reviews.title: My 8 month old Yorkie mix has terrible food allergies and I tried almost 5 different brands ...
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a miracle dog food. My 8 month old Yorkie mix has terrible food allergies and I tried almost 5 different brands of dog food with no relief. Finally stumbled upon Victor grain free and my dog no longer itches, no longer has diarrhea and has a beautiful looking coat. I highly recommend this dog food to any owner who wants the best quality dog food for their dog!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Our Dogs LOVE IT. ON OUR 3rd 15 lb
customer_reviews.text: Our Dogs LOVE IT. ON OUR 3rd 15 lb. bag. Normally they be bored by now and would have to add chicken or meat to get them to eat it while while. Unbelievably happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Studley

customer_reviews.title: It’s expensive but my dogs worth it
customer_reviews.text: Top quality dog food. My dog loves it and it’s great for his digestive system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My shepherd loves this
customer_reviews.text: I mix this with with another brand & my german shepherd loves it. Her coat also is nice & shiny
customer_reviews.author: Gina Thompson

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have a Boston Terrier - Boxer mix with very sensitive skin and it works for her. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food! It smells god-awful and it leaves a residue in her bowl and on my hands. My dog seems to be free of her rashes and is very happy. Despite the odor, I plan on buying this food from here on out for her!
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this food
customer_reviews.text: Switch my bully to this food and she lives it and her muscles mass and coat couldn’t look better!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie hurless

customer_reviews.title: I'm really glad I was told about this dog food!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has allergies to grains and this food is fantastic! She's a Great Dane and has a big appetite. This is more filling than the cheaper brands and ends up costing about the same as the lesser quality food. One bag usually lasts 3 to 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: B. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Great for my dog with allergies
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. We love him on it. He has severe allergies and the scratching has reduced dramatically since we changed to Victor Brand Dog food. Clarke thanks you for making such a high quality food and his parents do too!
customer_reviews.author: Windy L. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great Food, only brand Ill feed my dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, arrives quick. Dogs love it. Lasts 2 large, active Siberian Huskies about 5 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have heard of Victor for years. Being a fan of Fromm, I'm absolutely amazed by the quality of this product as well. Highly recommended, and my dog love it!
customer_reviews.author: Island Paradise

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like it. It's made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: We switched over to this food a while ago. Dogs like it. It's made in the USA. My dogs have food allergies caused by grains and chicken. We're able to avoid them both with this food.

customer_reviews.title: Regular Constitution
customer_reviews.text: A bit over priced but my Shepard loves it and she’s regular 😉

customer_reviews.title: when i had him on other store bought brands (high quality stuff like Blue Wilderness etc
customer_reviews.text: my German Shepherd had many allergy issues, scratching, hot spots. routine visits to the vet etc. I feed him raw meat as wel as kibble, when i had him on other store bought brands (high quality stuff like Blue Wilderness etc.) he woul itch. I was worried for him, i could see he was uncomfortable. My breeder advised to try this dog food and boom, no more scratching and everything cleared up. Cant recommend it enough.

customer_reviews.text: Great Service! Great dog food for those with allergies. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: All of our dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: All of our dogs love this food! Doesn't make their breath smell great, fishy. But its extremely good for them. Their coats are softer in just weeks of starting it.

customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie actually cries for this stuff. The ingredients are prestine. I was sent a sample package by Howard Garrett, the Dirt Doctor.

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent food for my giant breed dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent food for my giant breed dogs. The fish based protein is easily tolerated by most dogs. I have a Newf and a Dane. Both do excellent on this food. It's the only thing I will ever feed to my giants :)
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Moon

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food if you have a dog suffering from ...
customer_reviews.text: Great dog food if you have a dog suffering from any kind of food allergy. My dog would lick her paw and her stomach until it was raw... took her to the vet and it turns out these are signs of food allergies. Put her on this and she's MUCH better plus the tear marks by her eyes went away and her coat is shiny and soft! Worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love this food. We were traveling and it was great to be able to order it through Amazon

customer_reviews.title: ... this food for 4+ years and they both still love it.
customer_reviews.text: Both my dogs (beagle/jack russel mix & pit bull mix) have been on this food for 4+ years and they both still love it.. pit bull mix has the sensitive stomach, but has no problems with this food.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great food, excellent price! We were able to take our dog off of prescription food and anti-inflammatory meds for IBD after switching to this 5-star grainfree food from Victor. Love having it delivered to my door since this food isn't found at PetSmart, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sutton Henderson

customer_reviews.title: They love it and its the best for

customer_reviews.text: I have a very picky eater and he didn't hesitate to eat this! That means a lot to me...plus its made in the USA...plus its pretty amazing quality canine food. My dogs coat is shiny and the shedding seems to have eased up as well. He seems to have more energy and I like that its grain free. I really love this food and while I have tried different varieties of Victor, I think this is my dogs favorite.

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: Great food. The only high protein food I've found that doesn't upset my dogs stomach. Has been great for her skin and coat as well.

customer_reviews.text: my dogs loved the food...one of them has allergies so i wanted it for her, but my other dog that has no allergies ate it and it gave him diarrhea...it was awful...the one who had the allergies was fine so i really don't know how to review this b/c it was 50/50

customer_reviews.text: My beagle LOVES this stuff! He runs to his bowl every morning.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative after our favorite specialty pet food company stopped production. Murray loves it.
customer_reviews.author: lorri hromas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results for K9
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful food for undernourished rescued K9! He loves it and he looks tons better after half of his first bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Neely

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding Victor grain-free (Salmon) to my Olde English Bulldogge since he was 9 weeks old (he's 6 months old now) and he LOVES it. This is premium quality dry food. My pup is muscular and sturdy, and his coat stays shiny and in great condition. This food creates compact, healthy looking stool. My pup also loves the taste, he just gobbles it up. If you have an aggressive eating breed, you may want to look into a slow-feeding bowl due to the fact that the kibbles are rather small. But, this food is great. If I ever change, it will only be to a different flavor of the Victor grain-free variety.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: this is great dog food, my bulldogs love it and it's good with their allergies
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Griffin

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this dog food!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this food on a recommendation from a friend (who has 4 dogs!)... My dogs love it and it's a little lower in calories than some of the other high end dog kibble (my dogs aren't super active... we take a few walks a day and they wrestle a little, but they are mostly couch potatoes.). 1 of my dogs has had soft stool since I adopted him... we've tried a bunch of things from the vet including their special intestine health food and nothing fixed it...his stool is finally normal since being on this food!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Lunn

customer_reviews.title: First bag was ok and thw dog really enjoyed. As soon as the second bag started the ...
customer_reviews.text: First bag was ok and thw dog really enjoyed. As soon as the second bag started the dog got real bad diarrhoea. Amazon was gracious to offer full refund but the product isn't consistently goos quality.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Love It
customer_reviews.text: Nutritious and apparently delicious, this is an outstanding product for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Lois A. Vitt

customer_reviews.title: High Quality equal to Blue Buffalo with lower price
customer_reviews.text: My young dogs love it. Seems to be very high quality, because they are satisfied with a smaller portion.
customer_reviews.author: D  W

product_meta.title: VICTOR Select - Grain Free Yukon River Canine, Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description:
Size:30 lb

VICTOR Grain Free Yukon River Canine is made with premium-quality fish-based protein sources and is an excellent choice for dogs with allergies to certain proteins or grains. It is easy to alternate SELECT formulas to offer your dog multiple flavors throughout the year. This formula is appropriate for large and small dogs at all life stages.

VICTOR Grain Free Yukon River Canine for Dogs is formulated to meet the nutritional levels established by the AAFCO Dog Food Nutrient Profiles for All Life Stages, including growth of large size dogs (70 lb. or more as an adult).

CALORIE CONTENT (Calculated ME):

3666 kcal/kg; 390 kcal/cup 

GUARANTEED ANALYSIS: 

Crude Protein ------------- 33.0% ( Min.), 
Crude Fat ------------------ 16.0% ( Min.), 
Crude Fiber ----------------- 3.8% ( Max.), 
Moisture -------------------- 9.0% ( Max.), 
Linoleic Acid (Omega 6) --- 2.4% ( Min.), 
Linolenic Acid (Omega 3) -- 0.4% ( Min.), 
DHA ---------------------- 0.1% ( Min.), 
Zinc -------------------- 150 mg/kg ( Min.), 
Selenium 0.35 mg/kg ( Min.), 
Vitamin E 150 IU/kg ( Min.), 
L-Carnitine* 80 mg/kg ( Min.), 

*Not recognized as an essential nutrient by the AAFCO Dog Food Nutrient Profiles

INGREDIENTS: 

 Menhaden Fish Meal (source of DHA-Docosahexaenoic Acid), Peas, Chicken Fat (preserved with mixed Tocopherols), Garbanzo Bean, Dehydrated Salmon, Sweet Potato, Yeast Culture, Dehydrated Alfalfa Meal, Blood Meal, Natural Flavor, Potassium Chloride, Carrot Powder, Tomato Pomace (source of Lycopene), Taurine, Salt, Choline Chloride, Dried Seaweed Meal, Zinc Methionine Complex, Vitamin E Supplement, Hydrolyzed Yeast, Iron Amino Acid Complex, Calcium Carbonate, Manganese Amino Acid Complex, Ferrous Sulfate, L-Carnitine, Selenium Yeast, Copper Sulfate, Niacin Supplement, Vitamin B12 Supplement, D-Calcium Pantothenate, Vitamin A Supplement, Thiamine Mononitrate, Biotin, Riboflavin Supplement, Calcium Iodate, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Vitamin D3 Supplement, Powdered Cellulose, Brewers Dried Yeast, Dried Enterococcus Faecium Fermentation Product, Dried Aspergillus Oryzae Fermentation Extract, Dried Trichoderma Longibrachiatum Fermentation Extract, Dried Bacillus Subtilis Fermentation Extract, Silicon Dioxide, Tetra Sodium Pyrophosphate, Vegetable Oil, Rosemary Extract, Green Tea Extract, Spearmint Extract, Lecithin, Fructooligosaccharide, Folic Acid, Yucca Schidigera Extract

FEEDING GUIDELINES: 

 Refer to Recommended Feeding Chart for Adult Dogs. 
Number of Cups Per Day (8 oz measuring cup) 

5 lbs. ------- ½ cup 
10 lbs. ------ ⅞ cup 
15 lbs. ------ 1 ¼ cups 
20 lbs. ------ 1 ½ cups 
30 lbs. ------ 2 cups 
40 lbs. ------ 2 ½ cups 
60 lbs. ------ 3 ⅜ cups 
80 lbs. ------ 4 ¼ cups 
100 lbs. ----- 5 cups 

Increase feeding intake by ½ cup for every 20 lbs over 100 lbs

FEEDING PUPPIES:

Puppies will typically start nibbling moistened dog foods at 3 to 4 weeks of age. Feed as much as the puppy will eat in 20 minutes in 4 feeding intervals spaced throughout the day. May be mixed with water, broth or milk at a ratio of 3 parts food to 1 part liquid. To ensure product freshness, do not leave moistened food out for more than 30 minutes. Puppies will be weaned from milk by 3 weeks of age. Continue to feed up to 4 times per day. Within a few months, the puppies may be transitioned to a self-feeder. After age one, feed to maintain good body condition, using the feeding chart as a guide.

PREGNANCY AND NURSING:

Energy requirements continually change during stages of gestation and lactation and may require up to four times recommended levels of intake. Adjust amount of food provided to maintain good body condition of your female dog. 

TIPS ON TRANSITIONING TO VICTOR:

When changing from a different food to any VICTOR dog food formula, transition your dog to VICTOR over the course of one week to 10 days, gradually increasing the amount of VICTOR every few days. 

Keep fresh water available at all times.
feature_bullets: Grain Free for dogs with allergies or sensitivity to grain
All Life Stages formula with premium-quality fish as primary protein source
Ideal for dogs with allergies to other meat proteins
Fortified with vitamins, minerals, essential fatty acids, protein and amino acids
Formulated with our scientifically advanced, proven VICTOR Core ingredients

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
